text: Count Your Lucky Stars Records is an American independent record label based in Fenton, Michigan. The label has released albums by bands such as Empire! Empire! (I Was A Lonely Estate), Joie De Vivre, Annabel, Moving Mountains, Benton Falls, Snowing, Into It. Over It. and CSTVT. It is involved in the emo revival movement and is run by Keith and Cathy Latinen of Empire! Empire!. == Bands== ===Current=== * American Thunder Band * The Cardboard Swords * CSTVT * Certain People I Know * Dowsing * Driving on City Sidewalks * Empire! Empire!
